channel.title: Need help with something not too dificult please help
channel.description:
I need some help. i need to learn how to code my own client...so i can run my server successfully...right now i'm using hamachi but i'm gonna be switching to a regular base...please help me...i need basic coding skills....my Hamachi server IP is: 5.255.158.233 it doesn't lag and i still do need to add more things to it but it's a great server in progress. :D
Btw! it's deltascape based. if that helps.
Thank you, Rorak4

item.title: Need help with something not too dificult please help
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“Rorak4, post:5, topic:231788”]Lol sorry to bother again but i’m not much of a learner when it comes to reading…it has to be hands on…may someone walk me through?..i’m almost always signed on my msn…it’s "frddynator15@hotmail.com" so if you wish to help and i hope someone does…IM me ;D

Thank You,
Rorak4

Anyone?..please[/quote]No, nobody is going to handfeed you java code. A tutorial is all you’re going to get from me, either read it or don’t.

Read full topic
